text: @mmpadellan @realDonaldTrump is always golfing or making up a list of lies to tell us!You are correct,that is BS,🐂💩! I couldn’t believe he actually blamed Andrew Cuomo,4 not being fast enough to catch the Covid-19 virus! Trump shouldn’t throw stones! Cuomo was on it,before Trump. #COVID19
